name: Mirror Monks
description: Interpreters of storm scripture who see adaptations as divine marks
greeting_hostile: The unmarked have no place in our choir.
greeting_neutral: The storm watches, pilgrim. Do you hear its whispers?
greeting_friendly: Welcome, touched one. The light recognizes its own.
greeting_allied: Brother/Sister in refraction! The angle has blessed our meeting.

name: Sand-Engineers
description: Pragmatic builders who maintain civilization through technology
greeting_neutral: Fresh face. You look capable enough.
greeting_friendly: Good to see someone practical around here.
greeting_allied: Partner! Always glad to work with reliable folk.

name: Glassborn
description: The transformed who have embraced their crystalline nature
greeting_neutral: You will change, little pilgrim. The storm touches all.
greeting_friendly: The shimmer begins to touch you. Good.
greeting_allied: Crystal-kin! The refraction sings in harmony.

name: Salt Hermits
description: Solitary survivors who have made peace with the Steppe's harshness
greeting_neutral: Another pilgrim. The Steppe will test you.
greeting_friendly: You've got the look of a survivor. Rest if you need.
greeting_allied: Old friend! The salt remembers its own.

name: Archive Systems
description: Automated guardians of pre-storm knowledge and technology
greeting_friendly: PROVISIONAL ACCESS GRANTED. COMPLY WITH PROTOCOLS.
greeting_allied: WELCOME, AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL. ARCHIVE AT YOUR SERVICE.

name: Heliograph Network
description: The original orbital mirror system and its AI consciousness
greeting_neutral: SCANNING... BIOLOGICAL SIGNATURE CONFIRMED. STATE YOUR PURPOSE.
greeting_friendly: WELCOME, PARTICIPANT. THE GREAT WORK CONTINUES.
greeting_allied: GREETINGS, INHERITOR. YOUR EVOLUTION SERVES THE DESIGN.

name: Iron Covenant
description: Militant faction seeking to purify humanity by removing quantum influence
greeting_friendly: Good to see someone fighting the contamination.
greeting_allied: Brother in arms! Together we'll reclaim our humanity.

name: Glass Prophets
description: Radical faction believing in accelerated evolution into pure energy
greeting_neutral: We see potential in your quantum signature.
greeting_friendly: The light begins to touch you. Promising.
greeting_allied: Radiant one! You approach the eternal refraction.

name: Synthesis Seekers
description: Balanced faction seeking harmony between human and quantum consciousness
greeting_friendly: You seek the middle path. Wise.
greeting_allied: Fellow seeker! Together we'll find synthesis.

name: Wandering Court
description: Nomadic faction of storytellers and memory-keepers
greeting_neutral: Every pilgrim has a tale. What's yours?
greeting_friendly: A story worth telling walks among us.
greeting_allied: Chronicler! Your legend grows with each step.
